summary: ONE OF THE VEHICLES HEADLIGHTS WENT OUT SOON AFTER THE CONSUMER PURCHASED THE VEHICLE.  THE DEALER REPLACED IT WITH A DIFFERENT KIND BUT NOW THE VEHICLE IS EQUIPPED WITH TWO DIFFERENT HEADLIGHTS.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER BECAUSE THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A CITATION FROM THE POLICE BECAUSE IT APPEARED THAT ONE OF THE HEADLIGHTS WERE OUT, BUT IT WAS NOT.  THE HEADLIGHTS DID NOT SHINE THE SAME, ONE WAS DULL AND ONE WAS BRIGHT.   *NLM
